item.title: Welcome to Main Engineering
item.description: It’s been a while, but I’ve realized that it’s time to make a return to active blogging. I’ve had the occasional post through my employer’s blogging platform, but I need to get better about blogging consistently and I wanted to have a forum that was mine. My goal is to treat this blog as an archive of thoughts and experiences as I encounter new challenges in my professional career. I hope that they provide value, and perhaps even entertainment, to you as a reader.
